hero.title: NO LIMITATION
hero.subtitle: Fight Club - Pleven
hero.quote: "Using no way as a way, having No Limitation as limitation."

home.intro: A martial arts club inspired by Bruce Lee's philosophy. We train body and mind without limitations.
home.whyUsText: Professional instructors, modern facility, and family atmosphere.

about.title: About Us
about.historyText: The club was founded in 2010 by Genko Simeonov and Pantaley Gergov, who are Senior Instructors in Jeet Kune Do. Initially, the club focused on mixed martial arts under the name MMA Pleven. Gradually, the club expanded its activities to include multiple combat disciplines - MMA, Grappling, San Da, and Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. This expansion led to renaming the club to No Limitation.
about.philosophyText: The club's name comes from a Bruce Lee quote: "Using no way as a way, having No Limitation as limitation". We believe everyone can reach their potential through hard work and proper guidance, without limitations - both physical and mental.
about.partnershipText: The club works in collaboration with Twisted Jiu Jitsu for Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.

schedule.title: Training Schedule
schedule.subtitle: Choose your training time and join us on the mat
schedule.contactUs: Contact us for more information about training and enrollment.

jkd.name: Jeet Kune Do
jkd.description: Jeet Kune Do ("The Way of the Intercepting Fist") is a martial art created by Bruce Lee. It's more of a fighting philosophy than a fixed style.

mma.name: MMA
mma.description: Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) combines techniques from various disciplines - boxing, kickboxing, wrestling, Brazilian jiu-jitsu, and more.

bjj.name: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu
bjj.description: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu is a martial art focused on ground fighting and submission techniques.

sanda.name: San Da
sanda.description: San Da (Sanda) is Chinese kickboxing that combines punches, kicks, throws, and clinch fighting.

eskrima.name: Eskrima
eskrima.description: Eskrima (Kali/Arnis) is a Filipino martial art focused on weapon-based fighting - sticks, knives, and improvised weapons.
